event_text: A yowl took m_c by surprise as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} patrolling the territory. r_c crashed into view, meowing about how m_c had to come and see. m_c followed the distressed warrior to a small ravine. event_text: m_c agreed to venture with r_c out onto a frozen pond. m_c went first while r_c hung back. m_c slid around playfully, taunting the other cat to chase {PRONOUN/m_c/object}. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/were/was} about to launch another teasing remark when the ice cracked below {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paws. r_c lingered to make sure {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't resurface before running back to camp with a yowl.

event_text: m_c and r_c talked each other into walking onto the ice of the frozen pond that lay not far from camp. It was a dare at first, but when m_c didn't immediately fall in, r_c joined {PRONOUN/m_c/object}. The two cats playfully slipped around for a bit before the faint cracks reached their ears. By then, it was too late to move.

Apparently the shiny red berries taste just like fresh prey, and r_c is offering one to m_c! The kit excitedly nods and grabs a berry with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} teeth. It's not exactly like prey... m_c was murdered by r_c, intending to take {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} place, but r_c miscalculated how many lives m_c had left! m_c retaliated by killing r_c in self defense.

history.lead_death: {VERB/m_c/were/was} murdered by r_c in an attempt to usurp {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} position

history.reg_death: m_c was killed by r_c in self-defense.

event_text: m_c and r_c were on a walk together when a pack of dogs caught them off guard. m_c prepared to fight, but when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} looked to r_c for backup, the other cat was nowhere to be found. r_c watched quietly as the dogs took life after life from m_c.

history.lead_death: {VERB/m_c/were/was} indirectly murdered by r_c in a fatal dog attack

event_text: m_c saves one of the Clan's kits from drowning, but loses a life in the process. The kit is well scolded for straying into the water but is even more subdued than expected afterwards; sending nervous glances at r_c that no one else seems to catch.

history.lead_death: saved a drowning kit that was set up by r_c

event_text: In the chaos of battle and the throes of a war, it's nearly impossible to tell friend from foe. Blinded by blood, r_c accidentally kills m_c. m_c lost one life.

history.reg_death: m_c was accidentally attacked by r_c in battle.
history.lead_death: {VERB/m_c/were/was} accidentally attacked by r_c in the chaos of battle

event_text: m_c has always wondered where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/sneak/sneaks} out of camp, intending to find loners who might have some clues about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} origins. Frantic with worry and confusion after finding m_c's empty nest in the morning, they launch a search. c_n finds m_c stumbling back to camp, pelt haggard and eyes haunted.
o_c_n attempted to break into the camp. m_c died defending the nursery. r_c remained hidden beneath {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} body as StarClan brought m_c back to life.
m_c died in a training accident.

history.reg_death: m_c died in a training accident.

event_text: m_c was killed by o_c_n warriors when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} accidentally wandered over the border.

event_text: m_c was killed by o_c_n warriors after deliberately crossing the border.

history.reg_death: m_c was killed by o_c_n warriors after deliberately trespassing.

event_text: m_c dies during battle training with r_c, r_c exclaims that it was all an accident.

history.reg_death: m_c was killed in battle training with r_c.

event_text: m_c disappeared from the nursery and was later found dead, not far from camp.

history.reg_death: m_c froze to death.

event_text: m_c was playing on the ice when it cracked and {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell in.

history.reg_death: m_c froze to death after falling through ice.

event_text: m_c wandered away from camp in the night, never to be seen again.

history.reg_death: m_c was eaten by a predator.

event_text: m_c vanished from camp after sneaking out. The search parties find nothing but blood.

history.reg_death: m_c was eaten by a predator.

event_text: m_c is found within a few fox-lengths of camp, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} tiny body cold and covered in bites. The scent of mouse hangs heavy in the air...

history.reg_death: m_c was killed by a feisty mouse.

event_text: m_c can be heard boasting that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}'{VERB/m_c/re/s} ready to be made an apprentice right now, and that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}'{VERB/m_c/re/s} already one of the best hunters in the Clan. That evening, to prove {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} point, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/sneak/sneaks} out of camp, intending to catch something for the fresh-kill pile. A frantic search party follows {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} trail, only to find blood and the foul stench of a shrew at the end.

history.reg_death: m_c was eaten by a shrew.

event_text: multi_cat drown after the camp becomes flooded.

history.reg_death: m_c drowned when the camp flooded.

event_text: multi_cat are killed after a fire rages through the camp.

history.reg_death: m_c died in a fire that raged through camp.

event_text: multi_cat are killed in an ambush by a group of rogues.

history.reg_death: m_c was killed by a rogue ambush.

event_text: multi_cat are killed in a badger attack.

history.reg_death: m_c was killed in a badger attack.

event_text: multi_cat freeze during a snowstorm.

history.reg_death: m_c died in a snowstorm.

event_text: multi_cat die after the water dries up from a drought.

history.reg_death: m_c died to a drought.

event_text: multi_cat die to a greencough outbreak.

history.reg_death: m_c died from greencough.

event_text: multi_cat starve when no prey can be found.

history.reg_death: m_c starved.

event_text: multi_cat eat tainted fresh-kill and die.

history.reg_death: m_c died from tainted fresh-kill.

event_text: multi_cat are taken away by Twolegs.

m_c woke up in the middle of the night to a strange noise. No one else was awake, or so {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} thought, until seeing someone at the fresh-kill pile. Before m_c could realize {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mistake, sharp canine teeth were at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} throat, ensuring the Clan wakes up to find {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest empty, and the prey gone.

history.reg_death: m_c was killed by a fox that snuck into camp.
history.lead_death: {VERB/m_c/were/was} killed by a fox that snuck into camp

event_text: m_c was taking some prey from the fresh-kill pile only to find a horde of rats! {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} called to r_c for help and together they fought off the rats, but m_c didn't survive.

history.scar: {VERB/m_c/were/was} hurt while defending the fresh-kill pile from rats.
history.reg_death: m_c was killed by rats while defending the fresh-kill pile.
history.lead_death: {VERB/m_c/were/was} killed by rats while defending the fresh-kill pile

event_text: Within the haze of battle and blood-lust it can be far too easy to mistake friend for foe.  Or, at least, that's what r_c tells the Clan after {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/kill/kills} m_c during a fight with o_c_n.

history.reg_death: m_c died after r_c killed {PRONOUN/m_c/object} during a battle with o_c_n.
history.lead_death: died after r_c killed {PRONOUN/m_c/object} during a battle with o_c_n

event_text: r_c stands back and watches as the o_c_n deputy kills m_c. r_c could probably have prevented it. Instead, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/turn/turns} and {VERB/r_c/pretend/pretends} {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} saw nothing.

history.reg_death: m_c died when the o_c_n deputy killed {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in battle, r_c allowed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} death to happen.
history.lead_death: died when the o_c_n deputy attacked {PRONOUN/m_c/object} and r_c took no action

event_text: r_c watches impassively as m_c struggles in a Twoleg trap, waiting till {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} slowly {VERB/m_c/stop/stops} moving before leaving the area.

history.reg_death: m_c died when r_c lured {PRONOUN/m_c/object} into a Twoleg trap.
history.lead_death: {VERB/m_c/were/was} lured by r_c into a Twoleg trap

event_text: r_c hisses {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} grievances into m_c's ear as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/kill/kills} m_c.

history.reg_death: m_c was murdered by r_c.

event_text: r_c attempts to take what remains of m_c's lives, but a warning from StarClan gives {PRONOUN/m_c/object} enough information to avoid such a fate. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} still {VERB/m_c/lose/loses} a life, but at least {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/manage/manages} to take r_c down with {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

history.reg_death: r_c died after launching a failed assassination attempt on the Clan's leader.
